name: Sonic Origins Pocket Edition
description:
Default Controls: 

 • Arrow Keys: Move

•  Z: Jump

•  Press Up and the Spin Dash Button to do the Super Peel Out

Extras (Beta):

•  You can play on mobile.

•  Collect all the Chaos Emeralds (or Times Stones) to unlock the Good Ending and The True Final Boss.

•  You can play all the OST in the Music Button.

•  You can play as Sonic, Tails, Knuckles and Metal Sonic.

•  Deleted Zones and Bosses never before seen.

Sonic CD Update!
